name: Glitzscape
description:
This goal of this game is to find and hunt the beast in map (Hunt the Wampus homage!). Both the hex-based maze of caverns and background textures are generated. To play:

- Explore the maze by finding open caverns adjacent to explored areas

- Left click to travel to a cavern

- An big 'X' in a cavern indicates that the beast is one hex away

- An little 'x' in a cavern indicates that the beast is two hex away

- Walking into the beast's cavern kills you

- Finding the exit cavern progresses to the next maze
